item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:

Miya's Sushi

By special request (you know who you are), the NHC scored a very special HH.
Many of you are extremely familiar with Miya's but for those who aren't, Bun, the owner would like me to share the following:

***Miya's Sushi is a 2 time winner in Taste of the Nation!
***Only CT restaurant 2 times in a row to be reviewed in the NY times in subsequent years.
***Will be featured this season on A&E...Flip This House


Please visit their My Space account at: www.myspace.com/miyassushi

Bun is being extremely generous and offering The NHC the following:

$5.75 for ALL drinks-this includes beer, wine and his 7 different homemade Saki's, and much more

HH food:
FREE - award winning original Sushi.

We will have our own room in the bar area. Bun said feel free to bring your IPODs to plug into his stereo sytem.

He is so happy to have us and is asking in return we promote his restaurant by telling friends and family about his amazing food.

The catch: They only hold 80 people. So he asked us to cap at 40 to leave room for his regulars. Don't know if NHC ever had 40 attend a HH but just in case....I'm capping! However...who would stop you if you just happen to be in the area and want to say hello? hint hint

**There is NO ONSITE PARKING. See Eric's comment below for suggested parking.

Can't wait to see you there!!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...
Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.


Post-party location TBD.

Contact:
Robyn-Allise - 203 823 5302
item.name: Happy Hour- MIYA'S SUSHI!!
